channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-13820] Replace ugi.getUsername() with ugi.getShortUserName() in viewFS
item.description:
When defaultFS is configured as viewfs –

<name>fs.defaultFS</name>
<value>viewfs://CLUSTER/</value>

List Files showing Realm as User –
hdfs dfs -ls /
Found 2 items
-r-xr-xr-x - hdfs@HADOOP.COM hadoop 0 2016-11-07 15:31 /Dir1
-r-xr-xr-x - hdfs@HADOOP.COM hadoop 0 2016-11-07 15:31 /Dir2
item.summary: Replace ugi.getUsername() with ugi.getShortUserName() in viewFS

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

archanat, brahmareddy,

  1. hadoop fs -stat "%F %u:%g %b %y %n" /Dir1 might also have the same problem. Please verify. If so, a similar fix might be needed for #getFileStatus also.
  2. So far, ViewFileSystem has been very identical to the FileContext ViewFs. So, should we also fix ViewFs#InternalDirOfViewFs#listStatus ?

manojg thanks for taking look..
Uploaded patch to address your comments and replaced remaining places also..

+1 overall

To go beyond trunk made UserGroupInformation as final and updated getFileLinkStatus also which was using ugi.getUsername.
